table_description: GitHub Issue Comments are the responses/comments on GitHub Issues.

columns.name: repository_full_name
columns.description: The full name of the repository (login/repo-name).

columns.name: number
columns.description: The issue/pr number.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The ID of the comment.

columns.name: node_id
columns.description: The node ID of the comment.

columns.name: author
columns.description: The actor who authored the comment.

columns.name: author_login
columns.description: The login of the comment author.

columns.name: author_association
columns.description: Author's association with the subject of the issue/pr the comment was raised on.

columns.name: body
columns.description: The contents of the comment as markdown.

columns.name: body_text
columns.description: The contents of the comment as text.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when comment was created.

columns.name: created_via_email
columns.description: If true, comment was created via email.

columns.name: editor
columns.description: The actor who edited the comment.

columns.name: editor_login
columns.description: The login of the comment editor.

columns.name: includes_created_edit
columns.description: If true, comment was edited and includes an edit with the creation data.

columns.name: is_minimized
columns.description: If true, comment has been minimized.

columns.name: minimized_reason
columns.description: The reason for comment being minimized.

columns.name: last_edited_at
columns.description: Timestamp when comment was last edited.

columns.name: published_at
columns.description: Timestamp when comment was published.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Timestamp when comment was last updated.

columns.name: url
columns.description: URL for the comment.

columns.name: can_delete
columns.description: If true, user can delete the comment.

columns.name: can_minimize
columns.description: If true, user can minimize the comment.

columns.name: can_react
columns.description: If true, user can react to the comment.

columns.name: can_update
columns.description: If true, user can update the comment.

columns.name: cannot_update_reasons
columns.description: A list of reasons why user cannot update the comment.

columns.name: did_author
columns.description: If true, user authored the comment.
